content:
New-AzureRmSiteRecoveryVault

Creates a Site Recovery services vault.

In this Article

Syntax

New-AzureRmSiteRecoveryVault -Name <String> -ResourceGroupName <String> -Location <String> [<CommonParameters>]

Description

The New-AzureRmSiteRecoveryVault cmdlet creates an Azure Site Recovery services vault.

Parameters

-Name

Specifies the name of the vault.

Type:String
Required:True
Position:Named
Default value:None
Accept pipeline input:False
Accept wildcard characters:False
-ResourceGroupName

Specifies the name of a resource group.

Type:String
Required:True
Position:Named
Default value:None
Accept pipeline input:False
Accept wildcard characters:False
-Location

Specifies the geographical location name.

Type:String
Required:True
Position:Named
Default value:None
Accept pipeline input:False
Accept wildcard characters:False

Related Links

  • Get-AzureRmSiteRecoveryVault
  • Remove-AzureRmSiteRecoveryVault
